welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mildenhall, a charming town known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cambridge Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and private aircrafts.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marham RAF Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport is exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
